p: Chemicals produced by alien species are allopathic to native plants. This is also called as a ‘novel weapon hypothesis’ [ 9]. This effect spreads alien species to new areas and suppress original flora [ 6]. Mentioned hypothesis was already tested on invasive species such as Eucalyptus globulus [ 10], Plantago virginica [ 11], Solidago gigantea, Impatiens glandulifera, Erigeron annuus [ 12, 13] and other.
